scripts.export: rimraf dist && tsc && copy readme.md dist
scripts.build:patch: npm run test && npm run export && npm version patch && copy package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.build:minor: npm run test && npm run export && npm version minor && copy package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.build:major: npm run test && npm run export && npm version major && copy package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.test: tsc -p tsconfig-test.json && mocha && npm run clean
scripts.testWithCoverage: tsc -p tsconfig-test.json && npm run coverage && npm run clean
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.clean: rimraf src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.js src/**/*js.map test/**/*.d.ts test/**/*.js test/**/*js.map index.d.ts index.js index.js.map
